description: The Tana Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Tana') is an amazing choice for any garden. This small shrubby tree is known to be extremely disease-resistant and low-maintenance, making it a great choice for hassle-free gardening. Not only that, its signature green foliage with yellow variegation makes it a stunning addition to any kind of planting bed or landscape. The addition of brilliant red hues during autumn adds a splash of color to foliage season. Its dense, upright habit makes it perfect for pruning, adding to its aesthetic, and its ability to thrive in various sunny and shaded climates makes it perfect for any garden location.
